name: Peruvian Namibian Mineral Mix (Rhodochrosite, Colbaltoan & Smithsonite)
description: What if you take the visual qualities associated with two precious stones and merge them to represent both? The image name indicates the two countries of origin of the individual minerals merged into one identity. This is symbolic of the physical traits from two races recognizable and perpetually on display. These visual signifiers of race, in some cases, reinforce essentialist, either/or thinking and harmful stereotypes.
